pageContext.claim: “The Roger Stone report on @CNN is false - Fake News. Have not spoken to Roger in a long time - had nothing to do with my decision.”
pageContext.analysis: Two days after this tweet, Roger Stone said in an interview on "The View": “I'm not going to contradict the president and I'm not going to say when I spoke to him — but I would say this, I have spoken to him very recently."
